alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Radar indicates a line of showers capable of gusts around 40 mph will impact portions of central Wayne County through 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Taylor, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Greenfield Village around 605 PM EDT. Dearborn and Wyandotte around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Inkster, Melvindale, Ecorse, Allen Park, Dearborn Heights, River Rouge, Lincoln Park, Garden City, Riverview and Southgate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
